item.description:
Please RSVP on Bandwagon to attend.

Have you ever seen skiing, rafting, paintball, or rock-climbing deals and wished you had friends or other like-minded people to go with?

Did you ever want to try new cuisines/restaurants and buy deals but then wished you had company?

Do you want to explore your city and discover new experiences that cost nothing and help you make new friends?

If so, Bandwagon is for you! Check out the Deals & Experiences, score a deal, then create your Bandwagon activity whenever you want. Make it a private affair and invite only your friends or make it public if you want to meet other like-minded people. You can also check out other public Bandwagon activities and hop on them. When you sign up, we notify you when there are fun things to do in your vicinity.

Bandwagon makes your life much more interesting and fun!

Join us for the Bandwagon launch party on December 15th at Nix's Mate, one of the trendiest spots in Boston for networking, complimentary drinks, and DJ music!!!

Sign in using Facebook and click "Hop On!"

21+. Attendees must RSVP onÂ Bandwagon.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at Bandwagon's table near the entrance
item.name: Bandwagon Launch Party! (Free 21+ BNT partner event - Must RSVP on Bandwagon)
